text: Mallika Sherawat (born October 24, 1976 as Reema Lamba) is an Indian actress. She was born in Rohtak to a Jat family. The first movie she acted in was the 2002 Bollywood movie Jeena Sirf Merre Liye. She acted in the 2005 Chinese movie The Myth. In 2010, Hisss was released. It was her first English movie. Sherawat played the main character, Naagin. In 2011, she was in another English movie, The Politics of Love. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1976 births Category:Indian movie actors Category:Living people
title: Mallika Sherawat
